Services available
AT Group Systems provides development services and application life circle support in the following area:
Software development. Requirements analyses, development, management, quality assurance, and code review.
Web design and development. Design, development, web services, HTML Mark Up.
Quality Assurance. Automated test scripts, load stress testing, manual testing.
Offshore Development Center at our office - your remote development center with qualified team of developers working exclusively on your projects. It is optimal way to establish your own software development department at most effective cost. You pay only for what you use - IT infrastructure, scalable technology resources, office administration - and no extra expenses.
Available resources:
PHP developers
.Net developers
HTML/JS developers
QA - manual testing, automated testing
Project managers
Additional resources can be added on request.
.Net Development
CRM, Document Managment Systems, Web applications and Web Services
Microsoft Reporting Services
Solid platform for reporting in your application
PHP MySql development
EComerce Platforms, Online Stores, Corparate and personal websites
